messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] OT - Human Interest or Disgust??
messages.msgSnippet: The following URL may better explain to some folks why Native Americans have had it about up to here.  My question always is and will be, would you like
messages.messageBody:
The following URL may better explain to some folks why Native Americans
have had it about up to here. My question always is and will be, would you
like someone to dig up your ancestors and put them on display. Or now,
sell them over the internet.

Let's let Yahoo.com know that this is not only illegal, it's unacceptable.
Talk about sick - selling a baby's body as an "artifact"
<A HREF="http://page.auctions.yahoo.com/auction/29534110">Yahoo! Auctions
-
child and related artifacts</A>

Lynda
If ignorance is bliss, why aren't more people happy?
